title: Lyn's Italian Lamb meatballs
ingredients: ['800g minced lamb', '1 onion, chopped', '1 garlic, crushed', '1 teaspoon oregano', '1 teaspoon thyme', '1 slice white bread made into breadcrumbs', '1 egg, beaten', 'salt and black pepper to taste', '1 jar shop-bought tomato pasta sauce', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes (optional)']
